languages.text: "Сдвинем чаши, эттфатер! В честь свершенных подвигов и в предвкушении тех, что еще предстоит свершить!"
"Let us raise our cups, Aett-Vater! In honour of deeds accomplished and in expectation of those yet to come!"
languages.original_text: "Сдвинем чаши, эттфатер! В честь свершенных подвигов и в предвкушении тех, что еще предстоит свершить!"

traits.locale_text: "Let us raise our cups, Thegin! In honour of deeds accomplished and in expectation of those yet to come!"
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Let us raise our cups, Aett-Vater! In honour of deeds accomplished and in expectation of those yet to come!"
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: «¡Levantemos nuestras copas, Aett-Vater! ¡En honor de nuestras hazañas y en anticipación de las que están por llegar!».
languages.original_text: "Let us raise our cups, Aett-Vater! In honour of deeds accomplished and in expectation of those yet to come!"

traits.locale_text: «¡Levantemos nuestras copas, Aett-Vater! ¡En honor de nuestras hazañas y en anticipación de las que están por llegar!».
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: “让我们举杯吧，狼领！为实现的光荣事迹干杯，也为即将到来的事迹干杯！”
languages.original_text: "Let us raise our cups, Aett-Vater! In honour of deeds accomplished and in expectation of those yet to come!"

traits.locale_text: “让我们举杯吧，狼领！为实现的光荣事迹干杯，也为即将到来的事迹干杯！”
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: 「乾杯しよう、アエット＝ヴァテル！成し遂げられた偉業を讃え、そしてこれからの偉業に期待を込めて！」
languages.original_text: "Let us raise our cups, Aett-Vater! In honour of deeds accomplished and in expectation of those yet to come!"

traits.locale_text: 「乾杯しよう、アエット＝ヴァテル！成し遂げられた偉業を讃え、そしてこれからの偉業に期待を込めて！」
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: « Levons nos verres, aett-vater ! En l'honneur des hauts faits accomplis et à tous ceux qui restent encore à venir ! »
languages.original_text: "Let us raise our cups, Aett-Vater! In honour of deeds accomplished and in expectation of those yet to come!"

traits.locale_text: « Levons nos verres, aett-vater ! En l'honneur des hauts faits accomplis et à tous ceux qui restent encore à venir ! »
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: "Erheben wir unsere Humpen, Aett-Vater! Zu Ehren vergangener Taten und in Erwartung noch kommender!"
languages.original_text: "Let us raise our cups, Aett-Vater! In honour of deeds accomplished and in expectation of those yet to come!"

traits.locale_text: "Erheben wir unsere Humpen, Aett-Vater! Zu Ehren vergangener Taten und in Erwartung noch kommender!"
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.original_text: "Let us raise our cups, Aett-Vater! In honour of deeds accomplished and in expectation of those yet to come!"

languages.text: "Kadehlerimizi kaldıralım Aett-Vater! Tamamladığımız ve gelecekte bizi bekleyen görevlerin şerefine!"
languages.original_text: "Let us raise our cups, Aett-Vater! In honour of deeds accomplished and in expectation of those yet to come!"

traits.locale_text: "Kadehlerimizi kaldıralım Aett-Vater! Tamamladığımız ve gelecekte bizi bekleyen görevlerin şerefine!"
